channel.title: Aside on Aggregated Thinking
channel.description: Recent content in Aside on Aggregated Thinking

item.title: A better Monday than most
item.description: The day’s just begun and I’m already up to my neck with work. But I’m not complaining. At least it’s server stuff and not some other crap!

item.title: on SLMIS
item.description: End users complain because the system isn’t “user-friendly”. FYI, it’s meant to be that way. It’s the only way we can guarantee that the system will still be helpful 25 years from now.

item.title: Featured images are so hard to use!
item.description: Ok, so I’m spoiled. Anyone kind enough to explain why they appear in some posts and why they don’t in others (featured images added, doh)

item.title: Preview (Dense) anyone?
item.description: I’m still trying to understand why Gmail’s new look gives me the migraines.
